metadata.title: CVE-2021-33098 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Improper input validation in the Intel(R) Ethernet ixgbe driver for Linux before version 3.17.3 may allow an authenticated user to potentially enable denial of service via local access.

notes.note: seth-arnold> We don't yet know if this affects Ubuntu Linux.

criterions.comment: linux package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
